articles.author: NASA
articles.title: NASA Powers Up a Massive Solar Engine for the Moon - SciTechDaily
articles.description: NASA’s Gateway is coming to life with a solar-powered spacecraft built to light it up—and move it around the Moon.
articles.content:
NASA’s Gateway is coming to life with a solar-powered spacecraft built to light it up—and move it around the Moon. Credit: NASA
